title: Big Cypress National Preserve: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Big Cypress National Preserve strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the national preserve by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting current news releases on this website. Up-to-date information about temporary road and facility closures due to weather is available by calling 239-695-1201, 239-695-4758, or by visiting the closure page on this website. For information on fire related activities and closures click here. If you are a member of the media, or the general public, and would like to receive preserve press releases, please contact our Public Affairs Office for additional information.
